title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Lactation Support Intervention Design Based on Legitimation Code Theory (LCT)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design breastfeeding education modules by applying the semantic dimensions (gravity/density) of LCT
Learners can explain at least three evidence-based care strategies grounded in WHO breastfeeding recommendations
Learners can establish personalized breastfeeding support plans by analyzing simulated patient cases using PBL methodology
Learners can propose at least two improvements for existing nursing education based on educational module experiences
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
